text:
Let's make a triangle! 
Put your hands together and make a triangle
It's a triangle it's a triangle
Put your hands together make a triangle
Put your hands together make a triangle

Put your hands together and make a rectangle.
Ready?
It's a rectangle it's a rectangle
Put your hands together make a rectangle
Put your hands together make a rectangle

Next, put your hands together and make an oval.
Here we go!
It's an oval it's an oval
Put your hands together make an oval
Put your hands together make an oval

Can you put your hands in the air and make a star?
You can do it!
It's a star it's a star
Put your hands in the air make a star
Put your hands in the air make a star
Let's make a triangle, a rectangle, an oval and a star
It's a triangle it's a rectangle
It's an oval it's a star
Thank you everybody say goodbye
Say goodbye
Goodbye
